required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on December 22, 2015
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Durability of Response and Persistence of Resistance to AbbVie's 2 Direct-acting Antiviral Agent (2D) Therapy in Japanese Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: A Follow-up Study to Assess the Durability of Response and Persistence of Resistance to AbbVie's 2 Direct-acting Antiviral Agent (2D) Therapy in Japanese Subjects Who Participated in Phase 2 or 3 Clinical Studies for the Treatment of Chronic Hepatitis C Virus (HCV) Infection

oversight_info.authority: Japan: Pharmaceuticals and Medical Devices Agency
United States: Food and Drug Administration

brief_summary.textblock: This study seeks to assess the durability of response and persistence of resistance to ombitasvir/ paritaprevir/ritonavir in Japanese participants who enrolled in a Phase 2 or 3 clinical study with these agents for the treatment of chronic hepatitis C.

primary_outcome.measure: Hepatitis C virus ribonucleic acid (HCV RNA) levels
primary_outcome.time_frame: 60 months after completion of the 2D treatment in M12-536 or M13-004 study

secondary_outcome.measure: Hepatitis C virus ribonucleic acid (HCV RNA) levels
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 18, 24, 30, 36, 42, 48, 52 months after completion of the 2D treatment in M12-536 or M13-004 study

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with serious adverse events (SAEs)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 60 month after completion of the 2D treatment in M132-536 or M13-004 study
secondary_outcome.description: All serious adverse events will be monitored during the observation period.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of participants with hepatocellular carcinoma
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 60 month after completion of the 2D treatment in M12-536 or M13-004

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants With Resistance-Associated Variants and Phenotypic Resistance to Paritaprevir in Non-structural Viral Protein 3 (NS3)
Number of Participants With Resistance-Associated Variants and Phenotypic Resistance to Ombitasvir in Non-structural Viral Protein 5A (NS5A)

arm_group.description: Participants who were treated with 2D regimen (ombitasvir/ paritaprevir/ ritonavir) and completed 48 weeks of follow up from the prior Phase 2 or 3 studies conducted in Japan.

study_pop.textblock: Participants who were treated in Study M12-536 or M13-004 with 2D regimen (ombitasvir/ paritaprevir/ritonavir) and completed 48 weeks of follow-up.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
Participants treated in Study M12-536 or M13-004 with the 2D regimen (ombitasvir/ paritaprevir/ ritonavir) and completed 48 weeks of follow-up, regardless of SVR achievement.
Participants who agree to sign the informed consent.
Exclusion Criteria:
Participants treated with a direct-acting antiviral agent (DAA) immediately after Study M12-536 or M13-004.
